00076 #define _O_RDONLY   0x0000  
00077 #define _O_WRONLY   0x0001  
00078 #define _O_RDWR     0x0002  
00079 #define _O_APPEND   0x0008  
00080 #define _O_CREAT    0x0100  
00081 #define _O_TRUNC    0x0200  
00082 #define _O_EXCL     0x0400  
00083 #define _O_TEXT     0x4000  
00084 #define _O_BINARY   0x8000  
00086
